section.p: Whether airway placement was confirmed, including time and method

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11528 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.175"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11261)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10542)/@code="71576-3" Airway device placement confirmation NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10541)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10546)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.02. If the confirmation is negated, this SHALL be "NA."

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10545)
NEMSIS Trace: if EAirway.02 is populated, this is TRUE

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:10544), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceConfirmationMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.60 DYNAMIC (CONF:10543)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11261)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10542)/@code="71576-3" Airway device placement confirmation NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10541)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10546)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.02. If the confirmation is negated, this SHALL be "NA."

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="BL" (CONF:10545)
NEMSIS Trace: if EAirway.02 is populated, this is TRUE

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode (CONF:10544), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet AirwayDeviceConfirmationMethod 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.60 DYNAMIC (CONF:10543)
NEMSIS Trace: EAirway.04

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.175"/> <code code="71576-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" displayName="Airway device placement confirmation NEMSIS"/> <effectiveTime/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation>
